Articles.Content:
So, I'm looking to begin producing a cover version of the KSP theme soon, but I need a starting point. I seem to be completely incapable of determining pitches or chords from just listening to a song, so I need some help on that front...

Does anyone know of a breakdown of the melody/chords of the KSP theme? Or even a MIDI version, that would work great as well. Once I have some of that, I can get started fairly easily...

Sure, one sec.

Concert C.

Chords:

    || C         Bb F C    Bb F C    G-7|| / / / / | /  / / / | / / / / | / / / / | 

Melody:

I'll just put the notes, you'll know the rhythm. 

    E C G CEG Bb A GCEG Bb A G C D (F) (first time through)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-16T23:28:24Z" title="06/16/2015 11:28  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 16, 2015</time> by klesh**

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57173-Music-KSP-Main-Theme-Transcription-%28Piano%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57173-Music-KSP-Main-Theme-Transcription-%28Piano%29)

That's got a transcription of HarvesteR's piano version. 

There's also Carbon Maestro's arrangement:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/YYp2BBKrSYw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

He has sheet music and the MIDI used to make that arrangement in the description.
Thanks, the both of you. I've got an in-progress version going now... need to add some good bass to it and then I'll pop up an unfinished snippet on my soundcloud.

> 
> Thanks, the both of you. I've got an in-progress version going now... need to add some good bass to it and then I'll pop up an unfinished snippet on my soundcloud.

So, how is it going? I don't see it up on your soundcloud.
